root.name: Sesame Street: Countdown
root.description: You play as The Count, randomly hitting a number between one through ten that spin in a circle. Afterwards, you proceed through the level hitting the number you selected, items that when grouped total that number, or question mark balloons that bring you to ether boxes with the number on top, a math problem, or a jar with items in it. There are 8 levels in total.

similar_games.game: Sesame Street: Bert & Ernie's Imagination Adventure
